title: Product Design Engineering Program Manager - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with your physical space. Seeking an experienced EPM to drive system-level requirements for mechanical assembly and integration.
description: This is a hands-on programmatic role where you and your team will be responsible for delivering the mechanical assembly through the entire program life-cycle, from architecture definition and early design to mass production. You will drive the program through the entire development process, partnering with our Design, Operations and Test functions to ensure its success. You will create and maintain streamlined program schedules by redirecting pitfalls and developing an improved course of action.
preferred_qualifications: Experience working with Product Design, Industrial Design, Operations, and System Architecture. Leading full life-cycle product development in highly dynamic and ambiguous work environments. Wide knowledge of product development processes and tooling timelines. Ability to anticipate functional direction and roadblocks, prioritize parallel closure paths, and effectively communicate data. Strong attention to detail and ability to effectively manage complexity.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $136,300 and $248,700. Additionally, Apple employees receive benefits such as medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products, free services, tuition reimbursement, and more.
